Text.Page:
Taking care of refugees is all well and good, but it'd be better if we turned them back into "people with homes and jobs," eh?

And that means extending our reach beyond Fey Forest into the rest of the region. Go talk to Reindal near Maon's Cabin. He's leading the push to reclaim the forest.

Maon used to keep the peace between us and the feyâ€”you know, the faeries, the centaurs, and all the other forest creatures.

Not his fault, but it's a bloody business now. Something's rendering the faeries completely irrational...and homicidal.

One way or another, we've got to turn it around. Whether that means forging a new peace with the faeries or wiping them all out, I don't know.
